statements: SELECT name, email FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE is_volunteer = TRUE
SELECT * FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE is_supporter = TRUE ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE is_volunteer = FALSE LIMIT 3
SELECT id, email FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE is_supporter = TRUE AND is_volunteer = TRUE
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE is_supporter = TRUE AND is_volunteer = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT name, email FROM supporters_and_volunteers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_supporters FROM supporters_and_volunteers WHERE is_supporter = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT name, email FROM supporters;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM supporters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE availability = 'Weekends';
SELECT id, name, email, tasks FROM volunteers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supporters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM supporters WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteers WHERE availability = 'Weekdays';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM supporters WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT tasks FROM volunteers WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT supporter_name, supporter_email FROM supporters ORDER BY supporter_name ASC;
SELECT supporter_name, supporter_email FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id = 1;
SELECT supporter_name, supporter_email FROM supporters WHERE supporter_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT supporter_name, supporter_email FROM supporters ORDER BY supporter_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id > 100 ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT communication_type, communication_content FROM campaign_communication WHERE communication_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY communication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supporter_name AS name, supporter_email AS email FROM supporters UNION SELECT volunteer_name AS name, volunteer_email AS email FROM volunteers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supporters s JOIN volunteers v ON s.supporter_id = v.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE skills = 'Marketing';
SELECT supporter_id, name, email, phone_number FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM campaign_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT message_id, message_content, date_sent FROM campaign_messages WHERE sender_id = 5 ORDER BY date_sent DESC;
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM volunteers WHERE skills LIKE 'Marketing%';
SELECT supporter_id, name, address FROM supporters WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT message_id, message_content, date_sent FROM campaign_messages WHERE message_type = 'Newsletter' ORDER BY date_sent DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_type FROM campaign_contacts WHERE contact_type IN ('Email', 'Phone') ORDER BY contact_name;
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT id, name, email FROM supporters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM campaigns ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT supporter_id, campaign_id FROM supporters_campaigns WHERE supporter_id = 3 AND campaign_id = 5;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM volunteers WHERE skills = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM supporters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE skills LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(supporter_id) AS total_supporters FROM supporters_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT v.name AS volunteer_name, c.title AS campaign_title FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteers_campaigns vc ON v.id = vc.volunteer_id JOIN campaigns c ON vc.campaign_id = c.id;
